author: holiman
content:
> seems like go-etheruem full nodes are not capable of doing debug_traceTransaction when the transaction happened like 300+ blocks in past

You just need to specify a reexec-option. And then geth might have to go back another couple of thousand blocks, to find a state that was flushed to disk, and then it will chug through those thousand blocks again to wind up at the state you need

author: holiman
content: By default, it's pretty low, to prevent trivial non-intentional DoS when people doesn't realise that the calll may cause the node to re-execute 20K blocks
